abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Second Beijing
            Environment Project for China is to support visible and
            sustained alleviation of air and water pollution in Beijing
            by helping to: (a) convert scattered coal-fired boilers to
            natural gas boilers; (b) promote energy conservation in
            heating systems; (c) construct key wastewater trunk
            interceptors and associated treatment facilities; and (d)
            strengthen environmental management institutions in Beijing.
